page.title: 19THE W.I. IN RISBOROUGH
page.content: Princes Risborough Evening Women's Institute meets on the first Monday of every month except August. There is a President, helped by nine committee members. At present there are sixty four members and visitors are always welcome. February 28th 1985 saw the twenty-first birthday celebrations of this group. Meetings are opened by singing "Jerusalem". The secretary then reads the minutes of the previous meeting for approval and signing. The business follows.-News of outings,reports etc... At nine meetings, speakers with varied talks entertain, their subjects range through jewellery, crochet and cookery to collecting china and travelling. Tea is followed by social hire and competions. The Institute fund raising has helped many worthly causes including a mental hospital, etc...
